oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charcoal print of Samuel Bogart, Co. G, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charcoal print of Sgt. Samuel Bogart, Co. G, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt, CSA. Bogart appears to be wearing a frock coat and holding a sword and pistol. Bogart apparently deserted the Confederate army as he takes the oath of allegiance to the Union in Athens, Tenn. in September, 1864.
